description: Exports a datatable to a CSV file.

input.name: separator
input.description:
The character used as column delimiter.
If unspecified, defaults to `,`.

input.name: newline
input.description:
The character used as row delimiter.
If unspecified, defaults to `\n` (newline).

input.name: columns
input.description:
The list of columns to be exported to the CSV file.
If unspecified, all columns will be exported.

input.name: filename
input.description:
The name of the output file.
If unspecified, defaults to `data.csv`.
